fields_of_interest: Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: DocuSign France participates to standardization groups at ETSI and CEN in the context of eIDAS Regulation. DocuSign France also closely follows expert groups in the domains of electronic identification and GDPR.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
DocuSign France is member of: 
- the association "Digital Trust and Compliance Europe" (DTCE) 
- the "Club PSCo" association 
- ETSI 
- AFNOR 
- FNTC 
- FF2I
goals__remit: DocuSign France is a Qualified Trust Service Provider (under eIDAS Regulation). DocuSign France offers trust services such as electronic signatures to business customers in various industries, in order to help them to transform their paper processes to fully digital processes.
relevant_communication: DocuSign France participates to EU Commission workshops open to the industry, DocuSign France is member of the association "Digital Trust and Compliance Europe" (DTCE).
